title: Lizard Egg
summaries: The Lizard Egg is a pet-summoning item that spawns a Pet Lizard to follow the player around. When the player is far enough away or in midair, the Pet Lizard will sprout wings like those of a Flying Snake to catch up with the player. The Lizard Egg has a 1/1000 (0.1%) chance of being dropped from Flying Snakes and Lihzahrds in the Jungle Temple.

statistics.Sell: 2 GC
